title: 1998년 Lewis 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Lewis. 판결일: 1998-10-26. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Curtis Lewis
**판결일**: 1998-10-26
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 254 A.D.2d 502
- 682 N.Y.S.2d 213

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by the defendant from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Queens County (Cooperman, J.), rendered June 22, 1995, convicting him of robbery in the first degree (two counts), upon a jury verdict, and imposing sentence.
Ordered that the judgment is affirmed.
Viewing the evidence in the light most favorable to the prosecution (see, People v Contes, 60 NY2d 620), we find that it was legally sufficient to establish the defendant’s guilt beyond a reasonable doubt. Moreover, upon the exercise of our factual review power, we are satisfied that the verdict of guilt was not against the weight of the evidence (see, CPL 470.15 [5]).
The defendant’s sentence was not excessive (see, People v Suitte, 90 AD2d 80).
*503The defendant’s remaining contention is without merit. Bracken, J. P., Santucci, Krausman and Florio, JJ., concur.
...
